required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Effect of Age Upon the Pharmacokinetics of Androxal
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Effect of Age Upon the Pharmacokinetics of Androxal

brief_summary.textblock: • To determine and compare the pharmacokinetics (PK) of 3 doses of 25 mg Androxal in elderly healthy adult male subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics - The Cmax will be calculated.
Pharmacokinetics - The Tmax will be calculated.
Pharmacokinetics - The AUC0-24 will be calculated.
Pharmacokinetics - the AUC0-∞ will be calculated.
Pharmacokinetics - The t½ will be calculated.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety -Mean change from baseline in laboratory values
Safety - Mean change from baseline in vital signs

arm_group.description: Non-smoking healthy adult males >or equal to 70 years of age.
Non-smoking healthy adult males<60 years of age.
